titleStmt.title: A caveat for the couetous. Or, A sermon preached at Paules Crosse, vpon the fourth of December, out of Luke. 12. 15. By William Whatelie, preacher of the word of God, in Banbury
Caveat for the covetous.
titleStmt.author: Whately, William, 1583-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for Thomas Man, and Mathew Lawe,

notesStmt.note: In this edition there is an additional preface.
Identified as STC 25300a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
